org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.deploy
Class AeAxisPolicyMapper

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.deploy.AeAxisPolicyMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeConstants, IAePolicyConstants, IAePolicyMapper, IAeWsddConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAxisXPathPolicyMapper, AeCredentialPolicyMapper
public abstract class AeAxisPolicyMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAePolicyMapper, IAeWsddConstants, IAePolicyConstants

Abstract class to help map Axis specific details of deploying policy for a web service.

public java.lang.String getDeploymentHandler(java.util.List aPolicyList)
                                      throws AeException
Description copied from interface: IAePolicyMapper
Determines the appropriate deployment handler key from policy assertions. If no specific deployment handler is determined from policies, implementations should return null.
